pkgmetadata.longdescription: objects kept from vignette1 to vignette2 // This package demonstrates that objects created in one vignette, "vignette1")", are available for another, "vignette2")", with "R CMD build pkgW2vignettes" + "R CMD check pkgW2vignettes" but not when "vignette2"" is built alone in RStudio.
